adText: Tegereza itike yawe ubu ugende neza!

bookOnline.title: Tegura itike ya bisi kuri internet
bookOnline.description: Tegura amatike ya bisi yawe vuba kandi neza uri aho ariho hose mu Rwanda, utagombye gutegereza umurongo.

trackBus.title: Kurikirana bisi yawe mu gihe nyacyo
trackBus.description: Menya aho bisi yawe iherereye mbere yo kugera ku gihagararo cyawe kugirango urugendo rugende neza.

easyUse.title: Byoroshye gukoresha ku mbuga zose
easyUse.description: Porogaramu yacu n’urubuga rwacu byakozwe ku buryo buri wese yabikoresha, yaba kuri mudasobwa, tablet cyangwa telefone.

footer.tagline: Ubunararibonye urugendo ruteze umutekano kandi rworoshye muri Rwanda yose. Tuguhuza n'aho ugana hose tukwizeye kandi dukwita.
footer.bookDescription: Tanga umwanya wawe kugira ngo ugere neza muri Rwanda yose.
footer.newsletterDesc: Iyandikishe kugira ngo ubone amakuru y'ibyitonderwa n'urugendo.

services.sectionDescription: Fata itike, ukurikire imodoka, cyangwa utegure urugendo rwawe byoroshye ukoresheje online, offline cyangwa USSD.
services.bookTicketDesc: Tegura urugendo rwawe uhereye ku itike yihuse, ihuye n’ingendo zawe.
services.trackCarDesc: Reba aho imodoka yawe iri mu gihe nyacyo ukanamenya igihe igeze aho ugomba kujya.
services.onlineOfflineBookingDesc: Fata itike ukoresheje porogaramu yacu cyangwa aho tugurisha amatike.
services.ussdBookingDesc: Fata itike vuba ukoresheje code ya USSD kuri telefoni yawe.
services.bottomDescription: Duhanga uburyo bworoshye bwo gutegura urugendo rwawe, guhitamo imodoka, no kugura itike byihuse.

about.title: Serivisi y'Amabus Yizewe Cyane mu Rwanda
about.subtitle: Tuhuza imigi mu Rwanda yose hamwe n'ubwitwararike butinzwe, bworoshye kandi bwizewe. Menya itandukaniro ry'ingendo n'amabus agezweho hamwe na Aby Ticket.
about.description: Kuva twashinzwe, Aby Ticket yiyemeje gutanga serivisi idasanzwe y'amabus mu Rwanda hose. Dukoresha amabus agezweho kandi yitaweho neza, hamwe n'abashoferi b'inararibonye bashyira imbere umutekano wawe n'ihumure ryawe. Urusobe rwacu rwagutse ruhuza imigi mikuru harimo Kigali, Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, n'izindi.

safety.title: Umutekano Ubanza
safety.description: Amabus yacu yose agenzurwa buri gihe kandi akagenzurwa mu bijyanye n'umutekano. Abashoferi bacu b'inararibonye bahuguwe mu gutwara neza no kurinda abashyitsi.

punctuality.title: Gutaha ku Gihe
punctuality.description: Twubaha igihe cyawe. Amabus yacu ataha ku gihe cyagenwe, bikugirira neza ko ugera aho ugana igihe ukeneye. Gukurikirana mu gihe nyacyo bikubwira ibiri kugenda mu rugendo rwawe.

comfort.title: Urugendo Runoze
comfort.description: Wishimire intebe nini, imyuka ikonje, umusarani usukuye, n'imyidagaduro mu busi. Amabus yacu yagenewe ihumure ryawe mu ngendo ngufi n'izide.

locations.subtitle: Genda mu Rwanda Rwose
locations.title: Tugeza Ahantu Hose
locations.description: Tangura amatike y'imodoka z'amabasi z'umutekano, ziyoroheje kandi za bucuti ku mihanda yose y'igihugu.
locations.ctaDesc: Imodoka zirenga 50 buri munsi zerekeza Musanze, Rubavu, Huye n'ahandi.

hero.title: Genda mu Rwanda mu Buryohe & mu Nteguza
hero.subtitle: Tangura amatike uva mu mabasi yizewe — umutekano, vuba, kandi yizewe.

bookingProcess.title: Intambwe zoroshye zo gutanga itike rya bisi
bookingProcess.subtitle: Tanga itike rya bisi muburyo butatu bworoshye - ukoresheje urubuga rwacu, aplikasiyo ya mudasobwa, cyangwa ukoresheje kode ya USSD. Gutanga byihuse, byizewe kandi byoroshye.

choose.title: Hitamo Urugendo Rwawe
choose.content: Hitamo imigi yo gutaha no kugera, hitamo itariki n'igihe ukunda. Reba inzira zihari kuva Kigali kugera Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, n'ahandi. Gereranya ibiciro n'abashoramari ba bisi urenze ushake uburyo bukwiye.

book.title: Tanga Itike Ryawe
book.content: Rangiza gutanga itike ukoresheje urubuga rwacu, aplikasiyo, cyangwa ukanda *334# kuri USSD. Hitamo intebe yawe, ongeraho amakuru y'umugenzi, wishyure ukoresheje Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), karita, cyangwa amafaranga mu biro byacu.

travel.title: Genda Byoroshye
travel.content: Akira itike rya elegitoroniki rya SMS na imeri ako kanya. Erekana kode y'itike ryawe kuri sitasiyo ya bisi, injira muri bisi yawe, wishimire urugendo runoze. Kurikirana aho bisi yawe iri mu gihe nyacyo ukoresheje aplikasiyo yacu.

faq.subtitle: Ibibazo bikunze kubazwa
faq.title: Ibyo ukeneye byose kumenya ku booking ya tike
faq.a1: Ushobora kubona tike yawe kuri interineti, uhitemo aho uturuka n’aho ujya, igihe ushaka kugenda, hanyuma wishyure ukoresheje uburyo bwizewe.
faq.q2: Nshobora guhagarika cyangwa guhindura urugendo rwanjye?
faq.a2: Yego, ushobora guhagarika cyangwa guhindura urugendo rwawe nibura amasaha 24 mbere yo guhaguruka. Igihe cy’imihango myinshi bishobora kugira ingaruka.
faq.q3: Hariho igabanyirizwa ku banyeshuri cyangwa abakuru?
faq.a3: Yego, abanyeshuri n’abakuze bafite uburenganzira ku giciro gito. Ugomba kwerekana indangamuntu igaragaza icyiciro cyawe.
faq.q4: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura bwemewe?
faq.a4: Dufata amakarita yo kwishyura, Mobile Money, n’ubundi buryo bwemewe bwo kwishyura mu gihugu.
faq.a5: Oya, ntibisabwa gucapa. Ushobora kwerekana tike yawe ya telefoni igihe winjira mu modoka.
